Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to rejuvenate and deepen your Kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you at every step of Shambhavi Mahamudra kriya with detailed instructions. Trained ishangas will be present in order to provide corrections. Here are the details of the upcoming Sathsang:
Date & Time: Saturday, April 8, 5 pm to 7:15 pm
Melbourne
Drill Hall, Multicultural Hub, 26 Therry St, Melbourne VIC 3004
Sydney
The Great Hall, Sydney Boys High School
11 Anzac Parade, Moore Park, NSW 2021 (enter via Anzac Parade)
Brisbane
Slacks Creek Progress Hall, 151 - 153 Barbaralla Drive, Springwood
Perth
Corinthian Park Hall, Cnr Beatrice Ave & Leach Hwy, Shelley, WA, 6148

Please ensure that

  • you are on empty stomach
  • you are seated in the hall at least 15 minutes before the start time as late comers will not be accomodated.

Inner Engineering Online participants
Please be outside the hall door no later than 35 minutes following the start of the session in order to join the Sathsang after the completion of the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya practice.

* Please note that Sathsang is conducted on the second Saturday of every month across centers in Australia.
